title: Kantai Collection 4-koma Comic: Fubuki, Ganbarimasu!
original_name: 艦隊これくしょん -艦これ- 4 コマコミック 吹雪、がんばります!
sinopse:
Enjoy the heartwarming antics of the World War II-Era Japanese Imperial Navy in the form of cute girls training at the ship girl school.

The 4-koma manga is based on the Kantai Collection browser game.

(Source: MU)
